section_a.beneficiaries: Lr The company’s activities will provide benefit to ... Anyone who has an interest in Focusing or is a Focusing teacher or practitioner. The objective of the Company ts to further the development of Focusing in the United Kingdom. Focusing 's a tool for self-awareness and self-development originally developed by philosopher and psychotherapist Eugene Gendlin. The skills can be taught to anyone who has an interest in learning them and can be of benefit in almost any sphere of activity. The company aims to make Focusing more widely accessible to the community as a whole
